troparion: (Tone 6) We are not worthy to praise You, but we pray and beseech You;* do not let us perish in sin;* save us, O merciful Lord.
prokimenon: O Lord, I love the house where You dwell,
the place where Your glory abides
Give judgment for me, O Lord, for I walk the path of perfection.
second_prokimenon: The Lord is my light and my Savior;
The Lord is the protector of my life; of whom shall I be afraid?
